subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5540 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,
I have not received my order yet for the haptics and the tracking number
looks fake.

Can you provide an update on my order?

conversations.body_text: Hi Zach J,  We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from vacation. Here is your shipping tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We'll ship it out within the next couple of days and sincerely apologize for the delay.

Thank you for the update
There is also a small 3 wire and connector coming off my brake pedal, I’m
not sure where it goes

On Tue, Jan 13, 2026 at 22:56 service@simsonn.com
Hi Zach J,  This wire is used to connect the base plate light strip module. If you haven't purchased the base plate, you can set it aside for now.

Thank you,

Second issue. I have plugged in the 3 pedals into the pedal box and
connected the usb.

The brake pedal registers as expected but throttle and clutch don’t show
any input when calibrating. What can I do to troubleshot?

On Wed, Jan 14, 2026 at 21:19 service@simsonn.com

Hi Zach J,  Please click the Offset button first, then follow the steps in the pop-up window to zero the raw (white) pedal signal to 0%. After that, recalibrate the pedals: press each of the three pedals fully during the calibration process, then click Save. If the blue progress bar moves smoothly from 0% to 100% during the pedal test, the calibration is successful and you can proceed to bind the pedals in the game.
